page.title: 05QUESTIONNAIRE - RUNCTON
page.content: The children of North Mundham School sent questionnaires to residents of the part of Runcton contained within our area. Of the fifty questionnaires sent out 33 households returned them, which we thought was a very good response, as at the moment many people are worried about the storage of information on computer files. In fact we found that the local people were very interested in this Domesday Project and only too keen to answer the questions put to them by the children. The results of the Questionnaire are summarised on the next few pages. The fields covered by the survey were chosen by the children (eleven years old), being their ideas of what might be of interest to future readers.
